name: Finset.mem_attachFin
initialProofState:
n : Nat
s : Finset Nat
h : ∀ (m : Nat), Membership.mem s m → LT.lt m n
a : Fin n
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (s.attachFin h) a) (Membership.mem s ↑a)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_attachFin {n : ℕ} {s : Finset ℕ} (h : ∀ m ∈ s, m < n) {a : Fin n} :
    a ∈ s.attachFin h ↔ (a : ℕ) ∈ s :=
  ⟨fun h ↦
    let ⟨_, hb₁, hb₂⟩ := Multiset.mem_pmap.1 h
    hb₂ ▸ hb₁,
    fun h ↦ Multiset.mem_pmap.2 ⟨a, h, Fin.eta _ _⟩⟩

name: Finset.card_attachFin
initialProofState:
n : Nat
s : Finset Nat
h : ∀ (m : Nat), Membership.mem s m → LT.lt m n
⊢ Eq (s.attachFin h).card s.card
decl:
@[simp]
theorem card_attachFin {n : ℕ} (s : Finset ℕ) (h : ∀ m ∈ s, m < n) :
    (s.attachFin h).card = s.card :=
  Multiset.card_pmap _ _ _
